snippet: The former police chief of Baton Rouge, Dewayne White, claimed Thursday that he had been fired because he resisted the meddling of the mayor’s administration in matters that included hiring decisions.
abstract: Dewayne White, former police chief of Baton Rouge, La, claims that he was fired because he resisted meddling of mayor’s administration in matters that included hiring decisions.
lead_paragraph: The former police chief of Baton Rouge, Dewayne White, claimed Thursday that he had been fired because he resisted the meddling of the mayor’s administration in matters that included hiring decisions.
